Container.Name: Plex Meta Manager

Branch.TagDescription: The most updated documented fixes and enhancements to Plex Meta Manager. This version is tested and documented to some degree, but there may be rough edges.
The absolute latest version of the script, but it could easily break, there is no guarantee that it even works, and any new features will not be documented.

Container.Overview: Plex Meta Manager is an open source Python 3 project that has been designed to ease the creation and maintenance of metadata, collections, and playlists within a Plex Media Server.
